summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for the period from March 1, 2017, to March 31, 2017. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments, highlighting significant transactions such as a large outgoing funds transfer.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Account Statement Summary
events.description: Summary of account transactions and balances for March 2017, including significant withdrawals and interest payments.

events.title: Funds Transfer
events.description: A cash transfer of $1,500,000.00 was made from the account.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: An outgoing money transfer of $110,000.00 was made to Bank of America.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $2,110,139.13 on March 1, 2017.
A total of $1,610,000.00 was debited from the account during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $4,425.84.
Service charges for the statement period totaled $50.00.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
